ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of PETER HARRISON of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Senior Associate Deputy Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development, to hold office during pleasure; and appointment of PETER HARRISON to serve concurrently as Executive Director and Deputy Head of the Office of Indian Residential Schools Resolution of Canada, to hold office during pleasure; effective January 22, 2007.
